item.title: Director Jaume Claret Muxart Is Hooked on a Feeling After Exploring First Crush in ‘Strange River’: ‘I’m Not Done With Love’
item.description: After Venice premiere “Silent River,” Catalan director Jaume Claret Muxart will keep on talking about love – also in his upcoming project. “It might end up feeling like a sequel to ‘Strange Rive
